title: Ticket #2923: Proposal - condor_ping command to get info on a daemon
description:
Greg and I talked about making a new client tool, condor_ping.

The purpose of this would be to find out if a daemon is alive. Secondarily it could be used to find out its version (and perhaps its entire daemon ad).

Ideally, this could be used for any daemon. Also, it could be useful against remote hosts.

I'm assigning it to Greg for lack of a better person.
